price: Dan pada hari itu Kami biarkan mereka (Ya`jūj dan Ma`jūj) berbaur antara satu dengan yang lain, dan (apabila) sangkakala ditiup (lagi), akan Kami kumpulkan mereka semuanya,
arabic: ۞ وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَٰهُمۡ جَمۡعٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wataraknā baʿḍahum yawma-idhin yamūju fī baʿḍin wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fajamaʿnāhum jamʿan
